page.title: 06W. WHITECHURCH FIRST SCHOOL.
page.content: Admission to School. The School's catchment area includes all habitations within the parish of Whitechurch including Chescombe, Whatcombe, Thornicombe, Manor Farm and Birch Close. Free transport is available to and from Thornicombe, Manor Farm and Birch Close. Children are required by law to begin school at the beginning of the school term after their fifth birthday but they are accepted for part-time schooling in the previous term. Twenty-one children attend the School housed in two classes - one for children aged 4+ to 7 and the Junior class for children aged 7+ to 9 years old. Children transfer to the Middle School at Blandford Forum at the beginning of the academic year (September) following their ninth birthday.
